title: League of Legends High FPS but it kinda jittery
body:
I was just wondering if that people who have high end pc rigs also suffer from this problem that I have. Lets say that I was running in a specific direction then quickly change to another direction. The problem is that the animation jumps and jitters instead of turning normally and the fix to it is capping to 144fps and its normal. I usually get about 180fps maxed out 1080p while playing League of Legends here are my specs (bragging  duh!)

Xeon 1231v3
Cooler Master Hyper 212 EVO
R9 290
8gbs ram 
750w Power Supply
cheap case 
and a bunch of fans.

replies.body:
Hi dragonlord

This is a known issue on some PC setups (especially higher-end ones), where the client can get a bit glitchy at very high frame rates.  As you have noted, the workaround is to set it to 144fps - which is about as fast as most monitors can display anyway!

Cheers!
Mindstar
Ah thank you I thought I was the only one.
